Package com.example.sids_checklist.checklistutils

Class Checklist_DatabaseHandler

java.lang.Object
android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
com.example.sids_checklist.checklistutils.Checklist_DatabaseHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class Checklist_DatabaseHandler extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
Checklist_DatabaseHandler is a SQLiteOpenHelper class responsible for managing the checklist database, including creating, upgrading, opening, and interacting with database tables.
